price: ߡߍ߲ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߘߌߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߗߍ ߘߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߊߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
